entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this evening then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming east 20 early in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Wind becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
